thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Epitome of 5 star
thread.title_full: Epitome of 5 star - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: maazb
title: Epitome of 5 star
text: Now this is a 5 star hotel. Huge, beautifully appointed suites. Staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. Ordered room service twice and was very pleased. Food was delicious. Great amenities. Excellent location- in a quiet neighborhood but close to major sites. Only gripe was that I found for a 5 star property, the beds weren't very comfortable and the bedding was of lesser quality. Ate one day at Kona, their onsite restaurant. Wasn't too impressed- overpriced and small portions. Otherwise, I would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel to everyone.
